name: Extreme Kitten
description: To run and jump as far as possible, start by pressing the button at the right time.  If your timing is right the cat will start sliding at the right speed and altitude, now you can help him by tapping on various objects on the playground which will extend his jump.  And prepare with the aim of the kitten, maybe it will roll like a ball to reach the goal but that is not far in a few meters you will make to buy power ups with the points you have earned to increase your high score in the next attempt
